title: Nuoc Cham
source: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
categories: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
ingredients: - ½ cup plus 2 tablespoons Squid Brand fish sauce
- ¼ cup plus 2 tablespoons freshly squeezed lime juice (2 to 3 limes)
directions: 1. Whisk together ½ cup of water, the vinegar, sugar, fish sauce, lime juice, garlic, and chilies in a nonreactive bowl until the sugar dissolves.
2. Use immediately or transfer to a container with a lid and refrigerate for up to 1 week.
